law.text: Any person who willfully manufactures a manufactured home, sells, or offers for sale a manufactured home, mobile home, or recreational vehicle in this state in violation of the provisions of KRS 227.560 to 227.660 shall be guilty of a misdemeanor and upon conviction thereof shall be punishable by a fine of not more than one thousand dollars ($1,000) or by confinement in the county jail for a period of not more than thirty (30) days, or both.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 340, sec. 14, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 76, sec. 13.
